content.detailedDescription: I was leaving for banff to go camping that saturday with my gf when my mother who was seeing us off spotted what she thought were military show jets flying over the open indian reserve across the street. the flew in perfect triangular formation like stunt jets but it became plain to see they were birds. we watch ed for about a minute then i decided to get my camera and film them hoping to zoom in on one to get a more detailed look. we thought they were very beautiful rare birds flying abnormally skilled and watched them circle from south to north until they disappeared as a result of being to far away and too high... here's what the camera caught...
content.summary: Black and white birds.

content.detailedDescription:
I am 51 years old now.
i lived in the country on 200 n. miami county between peru and wabash indiana.
this happened during indiana state fair time in either 1973 or 1974.  i did not have my drivers license yet but we had lived in that house for no more than two years at the time.
the time would have been between 9 pm and 11 pm.  i had just gotten back from the fair.  i had gone with a friend and his family.
my mother, sister and a neighbor were in our driveway looking at the southwest quadrant of the sky.  they said they had been watching for around 15 minutes.
there were five to seven "dots" in that area that were moving at different speeds and were changing colors.  they would speed up and slow down and change colors.  the colors were red, blue, green and white.  all the actions were random.  they could change direction and speed instantly. they looked like they were really close to grissom air force base.  we had just been through that area on our way home from the fair and did not notice anything at that time.
the dots were able to move across the entire southwest sky at a very rapid speed.
we watched for around 20 to 30 minutes more then got back in the car to see if we could get closer.  we noticed other neighbors looking at the area.  we did not even make it into peru before everything just vanished from the sky.  we called grissom but they said they didn't know anything.  we found out later that a number of people saw it. 
since i was a teenager at the time,and into science, i thought it was a cool thing to see.
i've not seen anything like it again.
content.summary: Dots changing color and moving very fast over the southwest quadrant

content.detailedDescription:
Eu s��� percebi o objeto(ufo)depois ap���s verificar as fhotos no lap top. havia na cidade de lages, santa catarina, um show a���reo da esquadrilha da fuma���a.

tamb���m verifiquei um ufo sobrevoando a cidade de cascavel no paran��� em janeiro/2010, mas infelizmente o video n���o ficou bom...You tube: "ovnis sobre cascavel"
content.summary: Foto

content.detailedDescription:
It was 21 october 1957 (about  17:00 to 17:30) and i was walking from class to my dorm (baker house) at the massachusetts institute of technology (mit) when i saw a large group (20 or 30) mit students standing next to the kresge auditorium staring mesmerized at the western sky.  
i stopped to ask what they were staring at and one pointed at an object which to me looked like a long vapour trail. the sky was clear except for some clouds in the western horizon which were slightly reddish as it was near sunset. i mentioned to others that it could be a vapour trail from a jet plane but i was told that this was not possible as the object changed directions very rapidly and it was clearly solid. in effect, as i stared at the object it suddenly flipped 90 degrees and it started to slowly move in our direction. it was difficult to judge the distance of the object since we could not tell its size but if it was 200-300 meters in length then it may have been over brookline ma or perhaps further west at an altitude of 30 to 40 degrees above the horizon. 
as we stared mesmerized over a period of 5-10 or minutes the object suddenly again flipped 90 degrees at such a speed that the eye could not follow the movement and it started to move more rapidly towards the north. the object was now closer to us but while it was still impossible to judge its distance (perhaps over harvard university?), one could clearly discern that the pencil-shaped object was indeed solid and metallic looking with a slight golden tinge. the object disappeared behind some tall buildings in the cambridge area. suddenly to the south two usaf single engine propeller planes appeared in close formation obviously to us in pursuit of the object which was no longer visible. 
to my knowledge we did not report our observations but there were reports from other witnesses in the boston area as reported by the boston daily globe newspaper on 22 october 1957. unfortunately, the observers quoted all appeared to confuse the object with the discarded sputnik rocket, which was clearly impossible to have seen in space (the launching had been earlier that month). attached is a clipping of the boston globe report. also attached is a copy of a letter from the usaf dated 22 october reporting a sighting of a pencil-shaped object at 13:35 on 12 october 1957 near martha���s vineyard by a fishing vessel.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lead pencil-shaped object hovering west of mit campus at altitude 30-40 degrees and chaging directions at incredible speeds.

content.detailedDescription:
I have had 31 encounter's with these fast moving orbs of light, some of them just moving slow, all of them during dusk or night. i have had 5 witnesses during 5 of the 31 encounters. 

i was walking to the store that early evening and looked down the street towards the mountains and spotted this red/orange orb of light just hovering approximately a mile away. i was quite excited as the week before, i saw 5 in nanaimo b.C, canada during the night with 2 other witnesses. 

it is apparent with all the nasa/ufo research that i have done over the last few years, these encounters are in similarity with the orbs of light quite prevalent with what nasa knows. i have a contact which goes by the name of *(name removed--cms/sg) from bowen island b.C, who recorded the nasa information and my encounters are very similar with those phenomenon discovered by *(name removed--cms/sg). it's interesting these times we are in. thank you for your continued research and support of this most divine and universal revelation manifesting amongst the human soul species.

sincerely, 

**(wit's name removed--cms/sg).
content.summary: Red/orange orb of light in east vancouver

content.detailedDescription: At about 10:33pm arizona time i was feeding my dogs in my backyard and as i walked over to turn on the water faucet i looked toward the western sky and noticed a tiny blue light between a break in the clouds. i dismissed it as a star at first but after turning on the faucet i looked back in that direction and realized it was moving. it then got lost behind a cluster of clouds. i then thought maybe it was just a plane. the more i thought about it the more i thought maybe it wasn't moving and it was just the clouds changing direction and moving fast. i thought it was kind of weird for the clouds to change direction that quickly but there have been stranger things to happen in the weather. so i kept looking in that general direction to see if i happen to catch a glimpse of it again. about 2 minutes later i see a much brighter solid blue and red lighted (blue on its right side and red on its left side) object headed east so i figured it was a plane and not the same thing i had seen just a couple of minutes before. that object started in the same exact circular pattern, veering to the left, as the last object i had seen and it went from a solid blue and red to a lighter blue and smaller light. as this light circled around in the same exact path that it had done just minutes prior it remained the light blue light. i took notice that there were no blinking lights on this craft at all. in fact there were a few planes in the sky at the time of this event and i noticed there was a significant difference in size, speed and lights. this craft would make this exact circular pattern occasionally ducking behind the clouds for about 1/4th of the rotation. after the craft's second rotation i viewed i immediately called my wife out to see if she had an idea what the object could be or if she could witness what i was witnessing. something strange thing that my wife and i had noticed was that there was a cluster of clouds that a plane had gone through and we lost sight of for a few minutes as to where this object went through the same clouds and was completely visible. the object was definitely within the cloud because there was obvious distortion but we never lost sight of the object in those particular clouds due to its brightness. however the clouds further west that were much wider we lost the object for a couple of minutes. when the craft made its circular motion and headed back in the opposite direction the light blue light remained. the only time the red light was visible was when it was in a head on position. again...I saw a few other planes around the area when this event took place and they look nothing alike. in fact i live near phoenix sky harbor airport and i can assure you this looked and acted nothing like any plane i'd ever seen. this craft made this circular pattern for just about 30 minutes (roughly 5 to 6 rotations at about 5 minutes per rotation and what i would think was at least 15 miles in diameter and if my math is right 47.12 miles in circumference) from the time i started viewing. note that this is a rough estimate and that my calculations could be way off...But i do know that this object was moving much faster than any conventional aircraft and covering a significant amount of distance in a short period of time and much too precise to be any man-made craft i'd ever seen. eventually the object went behind the clouds one last time and as i looked to see when it would come out again i seen 2 fighter jets shooting straight through that exact airspace. i waited around for about 8 to 10 minutes to see if the object would come back and circle the area again but it never did. the time i noticed as the jets came through was 11:02pm arizona time. i had no real significant feelings other than disbelief that i was seeing this strange happening. i did however attempt to video tape it but my camera which was previously fully powered now had a dead battery and my digital camera couldn't catch an object that far off in the darkness. i do have to say though just as the object ducked behind the clouds that one last time one of my dogs who is deaf began focusing toward the east and barking and howling like crazy. my other dogs just sat & stared at him as he did this. that isn't typical as where if one dog starts barking they all would usually start barking.
content.summary: A solid blue and red lighted craft circled the western sky for about 30 min in a perfect circle path.

content.detailedDescription: On august 21, 2010, seven friends and i were leaving a restaurant in cleveland, tn, at around 9:30 p.M., when we looked up in the sky and saw three large glowing lights in the shape of a triangle. the first thing i noticed was how huge the object was. the span of the triangle was incredible -- it was much bigger than any airplane. it moved very slowly across the sky. it moved too slowly to have been a plane or jet. the object made no noise and after about 3 minutes, it disappeared from the sky. i knew it was a ufo as soon as i saw it. one of my friends thought it was jet burners, but there is no way a jet could move that slowly. all my other friends watched with awe and said they had never seen anything like it before. i caught it on video with my cellphone and will upload it with this story.
content.summary: The triangle-shaped ufo was seen by at least 8 witnesses, myself included, outside a restaurant at night in cleveland, tn.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my fianc���e was driving on i- 75 south around 5:46 am. i was sitting in the passenger seat. the road was very dark during this time. my girlfriend was complaining so i put on my headphones. i seen a bright circular object appear halfway in the sky then fell at an angle towards the earth as we approached dixie hwy and i -75 in the wooded area. it fell southwest of our current location. i sat there for a moment and thought to my self for about 3-4 minutes. so i took my headphones off and ask my girlfriend did she see that? she said " thing thing that fell from the sky". i was like yeah. so we both had seen it. i had to make sure my eyes weren't  only playing a trick on me.Thats when i told her it must of been a ufo. i told her that there has been alot of sightings lately like in new york and texas. i felt weird after seeing that.
content.summary: Fell at at angle towards towards the earth.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv in the living room at 9:00 p.M. and about an half an hour later i noticed flickering lights below the awning of the side window.  there is a county airport across the river i didn't pay much attention because i have seen beams of lights for the airplanes, etc. after watching tv  i thought the flickering of light hasn't stopped yet, a bit unusual, so i looked outside and could not believe what i saw.  the weekend was cold, damp and very cloudy but no rain on that sunday evening it was clear but cloudy.  there was a long horizontal cloud and out the right side about ten spinning rapidly circular objects a half circumference moving together vertically horizontally at the bottom of the cloud was a smaller circle of round objects spinning very fast, also moving back and forth rapidly,  then the whole thing would disappear and come back this went on for one hour. at one point the objects spiraled downward and then the circles went into beams of light and spun around.  this wasn't that far up in the sky, i could really see this spectacular show.   i was paralyzed and did not have a camera.  i called my sister who lives across the river she saw one light flickering.  the next day i talked to several people who saw the spinning lights but didn't have full view like i did and they did not see the bottom circle of lights. these lights were opaque not clear almost cloud like in composition??  i wasn't afraid just mesmerized and wondered what they could possibly be-- supernatural?  i kept staring at the cloud beyond 11:00 everything disappeared. this happened in glassport, pa at the top of the hill on 7th street.  this event would be the south eastern sky.
content.summary: Cold, cloudy evening saw unknown round lights half a circle spinning rapidly coming out of a cloud moving vertically and horizontally, at the bottom was a small circle  of lights  spinning rapidly moving back and forth.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Let me first just give clarity to the reviewing administrator that myself, along with the other two witnesses have normally shot down the idea of ufo's in the stereotypical sense. that being said, here's our story from my perspective.

last night, october 18th, 2010, around 8:00, my fiance` laura, and our mutual friend abbie made plans to cruise dirt roads and over-all just pass the night away. a little after 8:00 p.M (perhaps a little before), abbie called to let us know she was on her way, and arrived shortly after.

we made our way down the usual stretch of the old reidsville collin's highway (anderson street, now), and passed through collins, georgia. i was in the back seat, and laura was sitting in the front alongside abbie. i was taking notice at the vast amount of movement in the sky, and the fact that the clouds were streaked, as if they'd been raked.

around 8:40 or so, we arrived at the entrance to a dirt road outside of collins, then proceeded to turn down into it. by this time, i'd pointed out the activity in the sky, which we joked around about being ufo's. it wasn't until we noticed that what looked to be a military air-craft was pursuing a very vague object that was seamless against the sky, did we stop to think we might be right.

the object looked like a very dull star at first, though it was indeed moving. i told abbie to stop the car, and when she inquired why, i told her we'd be able to make it out in a moment because it was about to pass under the moon's light.

once she stopped the car, abbie, laura, and myself exited the car, and watched this very vague craft become more visible the closer it drew towards the moon. the craft then passed over-head, under the moon's light, and we were all utterly dumbfounded by the very prospect of just having witnessed a ufo. we watched as what appeared to be military aircraft, or aircraft of some sort trailing this object. a description of the ufo is provided below;

the craft i saw was in the shape of a soft featured arrowhead. being overhead, i assume it was the bottom i saw. there were three obvious lights, one at each point, and a design in the middle of the lights that mimicked the original shape of the object. the design was a lighter color than the rest of the craft. the craft itself was black. almost seamless against the night sky.

we reentered the vehicle, and the time was 9:00. (not exactly, but i believe it was around 9:05-(9:10). laura grabbed abbie's phone, and decided she was going to call her mother in total shock of what she'd just seen. there was no service on the phone. i suddenly felt rather ill. extremely fatigued, my face felt like it had been doused with boiling water. i mentioned it, and abbie and laura both agreed they felt the same.

after contemplating what to do, we decided to follow the ufo. it wasn't soon after that it disappeared from all visibility behind a very thin cloud. the aircraft that were pursuing the ufo looked as if they were circling around the cloud. we were sure it'd disappeared, when they began forming a triangular shaped pattern near this cloud. seemingly out of no-where, this bright orange tinted light suddenly appeared through the cloud, and the ufo became visible once more as it sped past the aircraft.

the ufo once again passed near the moon's light, and then began to turn, which granted me the ability of gauging the craft had multiple dimensions and was indeed soft-featured. once the craft completed it's turn, it began a slow diagonal ascension.

at this point, all disbelief has left the three of us. we're intrigued, but tired. rather distraught, but morbidly curious.

while still following the craft, we turned back onto the main highway outside of collins. we all watched in disbelief as the ufo disappeared yet again. we watched as aircraft began swarming the area it'd disappeared in. we made it back to my fiance's mother's house around 10:00. the three of us decided to ensure no one was lying, we all decided to draw it and not show anyone until we were all finished with the sketches. sure enough, the sketches were all identical.

this morning, i woke up earlier than usual, feeling extremely tired and beat. i felt as if i'd been beaten with a bat. it took my fiance' a while to finally coerce me out of bed. she wasn't feeling well either.

about 1:00 p.M today (october 19th, 2010), abbie called us, saying she'd missed her class because she couldn't really move this morning.

we all decided this needed to be reported.
content.summary: Arrowhead shaped ufo was being chased by military aircraft above reidsville and collins georgia.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside lowering a flag. i glanced at jupiter off to my left.  it was visible in the southeast sky at about 70 degrees. i immediately noticed two stationery star like objects in the sky visible near jupiter.  i knew these had not been visible in the sky previously because i work outside in the evenings and had been watching jupiter all summer.  i looked away, thinking i would get out my astronomy app later to identify them.  when i looked up again, one had disappeared and the second was fading as i watched.  i watched it until it was no longer visible.  both lights were bright white, star-like and not moving.  they did not reappear.  i started to post this after that time but did not.  i'm posting now because of similar reports on 10/18/2010 in nevada and oregon.  seeing these marks my fourth ufo sighting in 10 years living in east central illinois.  i am always curious about these and i was curious about this as well.
content.summary: Two stationery lights visible near jupiter that disappeared

content.detailedDescription: it was sunday evening around 7:50 edt.  i was traveling east on highway 30 from valparaiso heading toward plymouth when about a mile out of town i saw a faint blue light with my peripheral vision low over the sky line .  as i got closer to town, the blue light became more prevalent.  i have my pilot's license and use to fly so i know that blue lights are not used on planes.  it had an odd flight path which seemed to go straight up, straight down then took a horizontal path over and remained stationary.  as i got into town, i could see not one but two blue lights.  it was hovering low over the walmart plaza, maybe less than 500 feet.  i was difficult to say the altitude, just that i could the aircraft through the driver's side seat without having to stick my head out the window to see it.  i literally drove past it on 30, on my left hand side.  i could not see the shape of the aircraft/ufo, just 2 big, very bright and intense blue lights spaced across from one another.  they seemed to be facing downward, shining the lights toward the ground.  i rolled down my window to see if i could hear an engine or rotors but it made no noise.  there is an airport nearby, located on the north east side of town, but it was stationary so that ruled out any airplanes.  helicopters can be heard a mile away and this was silent, not to mention the strange blue lights on the ufo.  i saw no other lights or markings.  it seemed too big to be some kind of hoax like a model.  i could tell it had some size to it and it was bigger than the cessna's i use to fly.  it stayed there for at least a minute or two in duration.  i know i couldn't have been the only one that saw it; it may know attempt to conceal itself.  you couldn't miss those bright blue lights!  i continued on my way out of town east on 30 until the aircraft become out of sight.  i've read similar sighting that was reported just a week prior in plymouth, as well as other sightings in fort wayne and indianapolis.  multiple sightings by people in different towns help validate what i saw and makes me wonder what exactly did i see?
content.summary: Bright blue lights hovering over town

content.detailedDescription: Last night i was having a difficult time sleeping and after i drifted off for a while i awoke about 5:25am and realized i didn't take the trash out the night before. so i gathered my shoes and jacket headed outside to take the trash to the curb. for some reason i had this really uneasy feeling but i ignored it. after taking the trash out, i went to the front porch to smoke a cigarette. as i walked out i stood there and all of a sudden i saw movement out of my perifial and imeadiately looked at that area. i couldnt believe my eyes, because it looked like an alien gray trying to sneak across the street unoticed. i even walked off the porch to see more and it had to be hiding. no trace of it anymore. i finished my cigarette quickly and went back inside. this looked like the classic gray alien, the skin looked gray and no clothes, there is a street light right in the path it took to go across the road. another interesting fact is that it's stride was different than what a human would look like. i took a picture of my viewpoint from the porch later that morning so you can see in the daylight how far away it was and the direction it traveled.
content.summary: Alien gray sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my dogs.  i looked up at the moon, which was very bright and saw jupiter below and to the left of the moon.  i looked down at my cell phone and looked back up.  two new objects, or lights, appeared.  i thought they may have been stars at first.  then i noticed they were moving.  thought they might be planes.  then one of the lights faded and vanished.  the second object faded a few seconds afterwards.  it was to bright for the objects to be satellites.  they weren't moving fast enough to be meteors.  i'm not sure what exactly they were.  it may have been the sun reflecting off something in space. but all i know is the objects were only visible for about a minute.  i tried to take a picture but the camera on my phone was not good enough to capture these objects.
content.summary: Two objects below jupiter in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was actually on my way to take my girlfriend home after being at my house all day. on the way, though, i saw "floating" overhead what at first appeared to be just a lower flying jet. no big deal, i did not think much of it until i got closer under it.

i had started mentioning to my girlfriend about the low flying jet, and said something like: actually, if that is a jet...It's going incredibly slow unless it's having troubles or is just an optical illusion. the closer we got underneath it, the more we realized that it was low...Had far too many lights to be a plane of almost any sort, it didn't make a noise (at least that we could hear driving in my quiet car with the radio off), and it floated slowly north-north west.

at the time we saw it, the sky was dark but still lit enough for my girlfriend to see the outline of the object against the ever so dark blue canvas. she explained it to be the shape of a piece of pizza or triangular. she was positive that it had no wings at all. the outline i saw (quick glimpse because i didn't want to wreck, and distorted from the almost dark sky) looked a lot like a cylindrical shaped craft that fattened up a bit in the middle. the lights i saw on the bottom and side of the ship, were interesting as well. it had at least one that blinked (which made me think of a typical helicopter), but all the other lights on it were constantly lit. a light on the side, in fact...The brightest light on the ship, was bright but not blinding bright. it was bright as in, a large window open on the side of the ship with the light shining out of it.

after a vehicle pulled up behind me (i was traveling at a whopping five ten miles per hour), i did not want to hold up traffic so instead of pulling over i simply kept driving. it had been in our view for a bit less than two minutes i believe, and after we had completely passed it...Immense excitement came over me. it was awesome. also, during the event i felt really no emotion except wonderment and awe.

i wish it had been brighter out, and i really wish i had a camera. however, with the observations i mentioned, i tried to rule out some options and bring the list of "possibilities" to a smaller size.

i really try to refrain from jumping the gun on anything, but like mentioned before, i firmly believe what i saw was at the very least...Top secret new technology.

what we saw:
-larger sized object (ship, jet, helicopter) "floating" at a low speed north/northwest at ~7:40pm
-six (girlfriend counted, then recounted) lights with slightly varying brightnesses and behavior
-at least one light blinking
-no noise that was emitted louder than my car (from the distance we had seen it at least)
-appeared to maintain a steady speed
-pizza slice/triangular shaped (we'll go with hers since she actually stared at it)

what we might be able to rule out:
-jet (slow speed, unless it was slowing for landing, but it was going the wrong direction/noise factor)
-2 or 4 seater bi-plane (too large, not enough noise)
-blimp (never have many of those around especially later in the evening)
-weather balloons (definitely had some sort of shape, it was not a bunch of balloons)
-comets/meteors (taking everything into consideration, this thing was going too slow/was too low)
-hot air balloon (definitely not the right shape)

those are what i can definitely rule out. except for the blimp, the more i think about it...The more it seems plausible but we don't ever have any blimps in this area. there are no large arena's (closest is 40 miles away), and no other events going on. there is a small possibility that it could have been a helicopter but it seemed too large, silent, and had too many lights in odd positions on the body of the ship.
content.summary: Hovering triangular unidentified flying object approximately 35-40 miles away from pittsburgh, pennsylvania

content.detailedDescription: While driving west on padden pkwy in vancouver wa on my way home, i noticed a pefect triangular formation of bright sphere-like lights to the south of me in the general area of portland international airport. the lights appeared much brighter than the typical plane lights look in the sky as planes come and go from pdx. as i continued driving, i saw that the formation was completely stable, and seemed to be just sort of hovering in place. confused as to why and how planes would hold a formation like this above the airport, i turned and drove south down hwy 503 towards the lights, hoping to get a better view, and to pull over to determine if the lights were as stationary as they seemed. after pulling off the road into a parking lot, i got out of the car with my camera and snapped a photo. the formation then began rotating slowly in place, with all three lights maintaining the same spacing and distance from one another. i snapped two more photos while this was happening, and then 1 of the lights broke out of formation and moved steadily to the east. the two remaining lights continued to rotate for another few moments, and then another one left formation and seemed to move in a north-westerly direction. the remaining light became stationary, and then slowly faded from sight. if anyone else saw this, please submit your own report for additional verification. i phoned pdx to ask if the air traffic was moving normally and she said that all flights were operating normally. i could not think of a satisfactory explaination for what i saw.
content.summary: Saw stable triangle formation in the area of pdx

content.detailedDescription: I was filming the skies for anything out of the ordinary and at the western side of the base was a shiny object stationary in the sky so i took my camcorder to zoom up. boy it was a good close up view but when using zoom lenses it cause the camera to become instable. i tried to hold on the camera for few seconds to get a good look on the object. after like 30 seconds or more i had to get the tripod so i could get a closer and steady view. i ran into my house and grap the tripod and out like 10 seconds. i looked up in the sky hoping it will remain there. i looked everywhere for it, it was gone in a flash. i am including my video for you to analysis and send me your professional opinion about my spaceship video.
content.summary: Bullet shape lunar looking ship hovering near california air force base

content.detailedDescription: I was very young when this took place, but my brother also witnessed it. to this day i cannot believe what i saw, but i know for a 100% fact that we did. it was around dark, maybe just after and i remember this thing coming from over the trees. it was so close to the ground, that you could have tossed a rock and hit the bottom. it came directly over our heads and made no noise. to this day i remember it had no noise, but a sound that sounded very much like bass in a car. not the loud noise, but the vibration. my brother, who was older than me at the time, was screaming at this thing to go away. however, i remember jumping up and down and screaming, "come down,come down". its amazing how i can still remember how it felt as though this thing was playful. as i write this, i just cant believe it happened. we watched it fly over the house, very close to the top of the house. its hard to believe but i can remember thinking," wow, my parents have got to see this". one of the things that sticks out the most was those 4 huge domes on the bottom. they were glowing a milky white, like really hard to describe. my brother and i never talk about what happened that night. we both acknowledge that it happened, but strangely dont talk about it. this thing was so close, that being 6ft tall now, i couldve stood on top of the house and touched the bottom. it was about 20ft off the ground and directly over my head. to this day i have no idea what that was, but i am 100% sure that i did see a circular craft just feet over my head. sometimes i go back to where it happened in that house i use to live in. the back yard is a lot smaller than i remember, but those cherry trees are still there and thats how high off the ground it was. it was brushing the top of the cherry trees. sometimes, i wonder if anything else happened and i dont remember. i know that sounds ridiculous, but i ve heard of that happening to people and this thing was so close, it had to have known we were there. wow, unbelieveable how that event is in my mind like this 30 years later!! i can remember how i felt, how it sounded, what it looked like, what i said, what my brother said and what i thought about it. trully unbelievable.
content.summary: Circular craft 15 ft in diameter with 4 large dome lights on bottom

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside and looked up at jupiter and just below and a little to the north were what looked like two stars. they were very bright and did not seem to be moving. while i was looking at them they slowly faded away and did not come back.
i would like to know if anyone else saw this. they didn't seem to move at all just faded away.
content.summary: Looked like two bright stars in the sky and slowly disapeared

content.detailedDescription: I dont care if any one knows where i was at the time i was doing time in enfield ct after lights out at 1130pm we were jokeing around when a bought 10 min later the dorm lit up the lights were on but we realized they were coming from out side an we were on the top flor of a 2 story dorm we were on a good size hill over looking the ct valey an during the day we could see the foot hills some 20 miles away and those lights were coming from just over the mt tops an was coming at us it took a bought 5min before we under stood that it wasent a plain as it came closer we saw the out line as it rose up to pass over us it was verry large an thick i mean it passed over the dorm only 30ft a bove us as it passed over we started to run to the other side the air an the dorm felt very strang like we were moving in slow mo we got to the other side an could the back of it it had 2 very big yellow squsre lights in the back just after it pased a bought 70 yards the dorm started to shake an a loud noise an we saw 2 jets flying very slow as the jets passed the jet on the right shot sparks from undre the left wing at the thing an at that time the thing just left in a blink of an eye the thing made no sound an was biger than 3 foot ball fields wide an at lease 100yds long an a bought 100ft thick an we could see the under side it looked like it had all sorts of stuff on it like a ship on tv show the funny part no one rememberd the next day i started to rember back in 1996 or 97 when the news reported lights in the sky over airzona then i started having all sorts of re membering a bought that night an then i remember when i was a child in 1968 with my father we saw the same thing to this day i can draw in to a tee an i cant draw i cant get it out  of my mind beleave it or not i cant stop beleaveing it my spelling is bad but not me thank you for your time *(wit's name and posible identifying info removed--cms/sg).
content.summary: Lights lit uo the dorm from aprx 20 miles a way coming at us at abouhgt 40 mph o so

content.detailedDescription: This is my second sighting of this unexplainable object, the first sighting being on october 8th approximately at the same time.  at about 7:20 pm i heard our dogs barking outside, and after several minutes i was prompted to see what was provoking them.  so i stepped outside my front door, the dogs have stopped barking, and i didn't observe anything in particular they were interested in.  the sky is very clear tonight, no clouds around, and i turn my head up and see three air planes flying over head in different directions.  since it was so clear, i walked around my little apartment to gaze in the direction where my boyfriend and i had seen the ufo on the 8th.  the location of the first sighting is due south from my position and tonight it was clear, but just to the south-east i caught sight of the brilliant, awesomely bright orange star that seemed very similar to the one that had caught my attention 10 days ago. for almost a minute this object did nothing, no movement, no twinkling, just stationary, when all of a sudden it quickly began to ascend into the sky gaining altitude, then the orange bright light was shut off, it disappeared for a split-second and then the white and red blinking lights in the erratic pattern began bringing it back into view.  it continued to ascend for only a few seconds more before starting off in a north-western path which this time, brought it directly in a flight path over my home.  the object was triangular shaped, has only one red light with several white lights that blink in irregular patterns around the parimeter of the object.  the solid part of the craft appeared to be medium to dark grey.  this object makes no sound, leaves no trail and moves rapidly.  it continued on the north-western path until it game to what appeared to be another bright star which was twinkling multi-colors, came very close to this multi-colored star before changing course into a south-west direction. from there i lost sight. what is stranger is that the large multi-colored star that the object changed its course by, disappeared shortly after that.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Second sighting--brilliant orange star-like object that hovers before taking off

content.detailedDescription:
I was at lat.  36���51'26.92"n  long.  83���51'8.40"w  at a few moments after 6 pm est oct, 18 2010 looking north east....  was taking photos of a local new grade school and saw a blur and nev er paid attention ...When checking the images when i got home an object is in frame on one of the shots..

link to photo i took and have the original still on the xd memory card where it was taken. 

*(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg).
content.summary: Captured in image of local grade school

content.detailedDescription: On the night of october 16th, 2010 at approximately 10:30 pm i was driving down dante avenue of vineland, nj with a friend. as we were driving down said road, i happened to look out of the passenger side window and survey the sky. as i was doing this, a large silvery white object appeared seemingly out of no where, at exactly the spot to which i was looking. at first, i was caught off guard and did not know what to make of such a thing. the whole encounter lasted about 5 seconds, during which time the unidentified flying object stayed in its set position, and then disappeared into itself, leaving nothingness behind besides from the stars glistening in the sky. the object never moved while i was looking at it, but instead stayed in its exact positioning as i have stated above. it was almost eye shaped, with a domed top and bottom which met at the sides in points. it did not look as if it were too close, but it did not look that far away either. it wasnt a bright glow, not something that would have created a flash. but instead was a dull white silver glow. at first , i was in awe and shock as to what i was seeing.. because common sense told me that this is not something that i really should be seeing. immediately i had the sense that this was not something from this planet, and is not something man made. after the object disappeared, and it disappeared by sucking into itself almost going away from the middle out, i turned to my friend and said "i think i just saw a ufo" to which she replied "shut up, you're buggin." but i know what i saw, and it was not something from this planet.. of that i am sure. this is my first close enounter with the first kind.
content.summary: A sphere like apparition appeared in the sky with pointed sides, almost eye shaped and soon disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My alarm clock went off late and i frantically got dressed and loaded up my hunting gear (opening day for mass. bow season) in my car for the trip to my stand.   evidently we had a frost overnight so i started up my car to warm it up (leaving the lights off as to not shine in the neighbors windows) and i went to retrieve a scraper from one of our other vehicles when a bright orange light caught my attention to the north.
 standing in the dark i could clearly see the rather large orange orb(?)with a pale white halo traveling due south,i would equate the speed and altitude to a low flying jet.
somehow i had the presence of mind to run over to the car and shut it off to listen for any kind of jet/plane  or helicopter report.   what alarmed me the most was when i shut the car off there was  no noise what so ever coming from the craft....

the light never varied in intensity, blinked or changed directions. within about 20 seconds it was gone from sight (one end of my visible horizon to the other, due south like a laser..)
content.summary: Large orange orb

content.detailedDescription: Arived at job site about 9.20 am cdt, nobody on job. started looking around and then looked southeast in sky and noticed a silver object, looked like a ballon at first bright silver and shining. so i wanted to watch the object to see how it would float. then the object looked like some thing was hanking down from it still silver, i thought it was about 2-3000 feet high, and then its became a long and wide cigar shaped object that was white with to very stubby wings one on each side each wing was about 25% the lenght of the object the object, the obcect had no tail section at all, and it knowed looked like it was at about 10000 feet or higher and moving in a northwesterly direction at higher then normal speed compared to a jet . i lost sight of the object after about 3-5 min. after i first spoted it. also the object looked to be a transparent white and i thought that was odd. the body of the object apeared to look wider than a jet. it was not a jet.
content.summary: Silver then turning white, very long with two very short wings 2/3 back for the nose of the craft

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, a friend and i were standing outside my camper at the lake of the ozarks at deer valley campground. as we stood outside talking i noticed this object in the sky traveling to the east. it was teardrop shapped, silver, smooth, no sound, it seemed to be at an altitude of at least 10 to 15,000 feet. it was roating end for end like a helicopter with roter failure but was not desending and was traveling at a speed compariable to a jet at 20 to 30,000 feet. 

it was unique and i pointed it out to my wife and friend who both observed the object for approxiamely two or three minutes until it was out of site. while it was at approximately my 11 in the sky i told my wife and friend that i had binoculars in my truck that was approximatley 30 yards away and i went to retrieve them. by the time i returned the object was going out of site to the east over the lake. 

i thought the object was a helicopter or plane in a sprial at first. however it was not loosing altitude. i then thought it could be a balloon, but discounted that when the rotations were consistent. we all agreed it was something none of us had ever observed before. i checked for reports of sighting or other news reports but found nothing. it was bugging me so i decided to report it through mufon.
content.summary: Silver teardrop, no wings, no tail rudder or elevators, no contrail, no sound at approximately 10 - 15kft

content.detailedDescription:
I was 10 or 11 at the time so i don't remember exactly when the sighting happened but i moved from rafb upwood, england with my air force parents during fall of 1991 to loring afb several years before they closed it down to military.  winter of 1992 when snow on the ground was making it more difficult for me to continue riding my bmx bike to school, i made it to the top of the bike path that cuts through the edge of a wooded area and parallels a road for vehicles.  both roads go down a rather steep hill then the bike path curves left and leads straight to the school grounds.  more specifically, the bike racks. the paralleling road t-bones left and right where the bike path only goes left. going further left down the vehicle road passes the school on one's left then one would arrive at an entry/exit gate. 

after struggling to the top of the hill i stopped and checked my watch.  it was about 10 minutes to 8 a.M.  i looked down at the bottom then cocked my head up and looked at the mostly cloudy sky.  this being a monday and my hatred of school, i looked up thinking aloud that i hate mondays and just want this week to hurry up.  

while looking up i noticed a large, smooth and silver disc floating in the sky maybe a half mile from me across the vehicle-road-going-left, past some trees and above what i think might have been base personnel housing. the object had 2 black lines. 1 line dividing the object horizontally around the center and the other dividing the bottom half. the very bottom section was rotating at a steady pace clockwise if one were to stand underneath it. even with these lines sectioning off the craft, it still seemed flush.  the object was keeping position yet had a slight wobble to it.  when the sun could break through the clouds, it caused a reflection off the top area of the object.  this object was silent in it's hover and was only several yards away from the roof of the 2 story building.

i neither felt any sense of fear nor happiness.  just wonder and amazement.  i knew from watching cartoons that this is what's called a ufo and knew this wasn't a regular plane; no tail nor wings.  i knew i had little time left to get to school on time but wanted to get a closer look so i went down the hill as fast as i safely could.  i had to keep my eyes on the path because of branches and very wet snow finally making it to the bottom of the path before it curves left and looked up at where the object was and it wasn't there.  i scanned as much of the sky i could but saw nothing.

i hurried to school just making it to homeroom on time.  i felt nervous and was eager to tell anyone but class started.  i finally told a friend during recess but he just listened and didn't comment on it much.  i knew things like this wasn't normal from what i saw in cartoons so kept it to myself.  i tried searching online of other witness account but to no avail. i did however find out that there were some 1975 sightings on that base where it hovered over nuclear storage and from what's been reported through a lot of recent tv shows, ufos have always been attracted to nuclear weapons.

i may have seen 2 other ufos early september of 2009 flying from las vegas, over colorado on my way back to st. louis. i should probably report them as well.  although since it happened over colorado, it's been suggested to me that they were probably planes or jets from the nearby military bases.
content.summary: Saw classic disc, no dome, completely reflective silver, bottom 1/4th spun clockwise, whole craft wobbled slightly and was silently hovering over a 2 story building.

content.detailedDescription:
It was exactly 18:00 and i was outside talking to my son. he looked directly up in the air and said "what the f$&# is that? i got off the porch and ran over to him. it was metallic in color and round in shape. it was at about 15,000 feet. mind you there were two other commercial plans in the air at the time (that was how i tried to judge the size and altitude. but just a guess since i had no idea the size of the craft) jet streams and all. one was to the north west traveling west, the other was also west heading north. i only remember this because i noticed one had a jet stream that was dissipating quickly while the other was hanging around longer than normal. 
 
anyway as i look up it was directly over my house heading south (towards avon). this thing was moving rather quickly in a direct path but was zig zagging like a sailboat in tact. the zig zags were slower in between zig and zag, then it began to zig zag quicker; about 45 seconds it darted right then disappeared.
content.summary: Circle heading south at 20,000 (maybe)

content.detailedDescription: On saturday morning at about 6 am i was on my way to work, as i stepped out of my front door i heard a loud noise coming towards my direction, i looked up and down the street then i looked up but did not see anything, the noise got louder as if it was getting closer and i looked up again, to my surprise something was flying over my neighbor's house towards me,it was round tilted to one side and had lots of light, it was flying so low i could see the color which was like beige. i was so terrified because it was the weirdest thing i had ever seen. i ran back into my house and got my son, then i felt even more weird because when he came out all the lights were gone all he could see were three flickering lights in the distance and he could here the sound dying away, it was as if all the lights were now turned off.
content.summary: Round sphere like object flying low over house in hampton georgia

content.detailedDescription: Ok. my friend craig and i had just dropped off our friends and we were going for a drive. we were heading south-east on lafayette ave. when we both saw a cluster of green and yellow lights rapidly swerve through the sky. we both imediatly knew that it wsnt a man-made object that we had just witnessed. we both felt sick to our stomach and our eyes kept tearing up even tohugh we wernt sad about anything that we were awhere of. it seemed so close to the ground that we went to look for it. after about 2 hours of finding and losing the lights (whitch were blue and purple by now) we were able to find the group of trees it had landed in. sadly we were not aloud to go out to it because it was on private property. also while we were searching, we kept seeing this black ford taurus. i think they were following us off and on. it was like they were making sure we didnt find anything. i think that the people in the taurus were in aliance with the government. i strongly believe that the government keeps extra-terestrials captive and away from the public eye.
content.summary: Green and yellow lights. it was like 2 a.M. so i couldnt see much
